Bytway, getting the log up directly in M7 is great!

This may be the caused by many things.
First, did you select plugins in the target platform preferences?
Isn't there any exception below this one?

Not a PDE bug.  Looks like you're missing a class on your classpath.  Make 
sure you dont' manually tweak your classpath, and you use PDE to update your 
classpath.
